content.question: A particle has a potential energy given as a function of position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> by <math alttext="U of x, equals, 9 x squared, minus 4 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>U</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the force acting on the particle at <math alttext="x equals a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 a, cubed, minus 2 a, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 3 a, cubed, plus 2 a, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
